turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a caramel macchiato, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, where would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like it iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok would you like to add milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and what size do you want it in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one moment while i order that for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered a venti caramel macchiato to be picked up at starbucks in westlake shopping center, daly city, ca is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it will be ready for pick-up in 5 minutes, your receipt will be texted to you.
